PSA: DBS card giro even if you get your giro confirmation letter  take note DBS doesnâ€™t follow the due date like other banks. Your giro confirmation letter needs to be issued before the credit card statement date. Had mine issued 2 weeks before due date and was surprised to find it didnâ€™t debit. Technically it would take about 10-12 weeks for DBS cc giro.
Hi everyone  is citi rewards card + amaze still a good combo for daily food/transport/general spend?
This is true. Only way to confirm giro setup for cc is cc statement for that month. If statement says will be paid by giro  you are good. If not  manual pay first.
Private transport yes  public transport no. Gen spend for non travel category is good ğŸ‘

The other banks Citi  Maybank  SCB and UOB are ok. As long as you get the giro letter a few days before due date  youâ€™re good. Takes about 3-5 weeks for giro to complete. DBS is the only exception at over 10-12 weeks  nearly 3 months.
